messages.content:
Will there be a strict visual style kept for cosmetics, whether gained through rewards or monetization, in order to keep the purity of the style and feel of the game?

This is a sore spot for me due to games like TF2 kind of messing up their art style due to the way they made cosmetics.

We've explored trying to come up with far out ideas, and then seeing what they look like when filtered through the aesthetic of the game. Using a way out there example, if Palians wanted to dress up as <insert costume here>, how would THEY make it work?
